query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'income' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) as total_income, SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'expense' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) as total_expense FROM cash_flow WHERE tenant_id = 1;
